detaileddescription.para: This is an example that uses the list server to find games of tanks

sect1.title: Setup
sect1.para: Add the following scenes to build settings Assets\Mirror\Examples\Cloud\TanksWithListServer\Scenes\ListServerLobbySceneTanks.unity Assets\Mirror\Examples\Tanks\Scenes\Scene.unity

blockquote.para: Note: you can not connect to your own public ip address, to test out ServerOnly you will need a 2nd person (or a 2nd internet connection)

sect1.title: Api Key
sect1.para: Api key on the NetworkManager is a demo key that should not be used in production.
Visit Mirror Networking to get an api key that you can use in your game.
